name: EvoShoot
description:
Pitch : 

Kill enemies to harvest and absorb their mutagens.

Mutagens make you evolve and allow you to become more powerful.

Beware of parasites that will make you lose all of your evolutions.

****************************************************

Controls :

WASD or Arrow = Move

Space (hold) = Shoot

*****************************************************

This game was made for the ScoreSpace Jam #24
